function.name: es_statsagg
function.description: Creates an aggregation name containing the minimum, maximum, average, sum and count for field as a child of the aggregation parent. Returns a string identifier that can be used to identify this aggregation.Two sibling or same-level aggregations cannot have the same name. If a stats aggregation is given a child, that child will not be used. The parent aggregation must be created with es_termsagg().

example.description: Create a stats aggregation for the price field.
Create an aggregation “authors” that includes a field “stats” containing statistics for the “price” field grouped by “author”.
